DOC.brief_summary: There is a simple laboratory technique for localization of caries associated bacteria on tooth surfaces by taking an impression of the teeth with a material containing sucrose. The purpose of this study is to check whether the technique can be incorporated into dental clinics as diagnostic tool comparing to other diagnostic methods available.
DOC.brief_title: Technique for Localization of Caries Associated Bacteria on Tooth Surfaces.
DOC.criteria: adult/ patient of the student clinic in Hadassa, Jerusalem. children/ antibiotic taken in the last month.
